languages.text: {n}Трепет пробегает по нитям моего сознания. Это... Домин? Я снова чувствую {rt_mf|его|ее}, или мне лишь показалось?.. Сейчас я должна быть сосредоточена. Я вглядываюсь в струйки пролитой крови и рисунки, которые они чертят. Я вижу... вижу... Лабиринт. Неумирающий посылает мне знак!{/n}

{n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Трепет пробегает по нитям моего сознания. Это... Домин? Я снова чувствую {rt_mf|его|ее}, или мне лишь показалось?.. Сейчас я должна быть сосредоточена. Я вглядываюсь в струйки пролитой крови и рисунки, которые они чертят. Я вижу... вижу... Лабиринт. Неумирающий посылает мне знак!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A thrill runs through the threads of my consciousness. Is this... Enim? Can I feel {mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining things?.. I need to concentrate. I gaze at the streams of spilled blood and the patterns they have formed. I see... I see... A labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aufregung rast durch die Stränge meines Bewusstseins. Ist das ... Domin'{rt_name}? Kann ich {rt_mf|ihn|sie} wirklich wieder spüren, oder bilde ich mir das ein? Ich muss mich konzentrieren. Ich starre auf die Blutlachen und die Muster, die sie bilden. Ich sehe ... Ich sehe ... ein Labyrinth. Der Todlose hat mir ein Zeichen gegeben!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aufregung rast durch die Stränge meines Bewusstseins. Ist das ... Domin'{name}? Kann ich {rt_mf|ihn|sie} wirklich wieder spüren, oder bilde ich mir das ein? Ich muss mich konzentrieren. Ich starre auf die Blutlachen und die Muster, die sie bilden. Ich sehe ... Ich sehe ... ein Labyrinth. Der Todlose hat mir ein Zeichen gegeben!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un escalofrío recorre los retazos de mi consciencia. ¿Es... Domin'{rt_name}? ¿Puedo sentirl{rt_mf|e|a} de nuevo o es mi imaginación? Debo concentrarme. Contemplo los charcos de sangre y los patrones que forman. Veo... veo... un laberinto. ¡El Inmortal me ha otorgado una señal!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un escalofrío recorre los retazos de mi consciencia. ¿Es... Domin'{rt_name}? ¿Puedo sentirl{rt_mf|e|a} de nuevo o es mi imaginación? Debo concentrarme. Contemplo los charcos de sangre y los patrones que forman. Veo... veo... un laberinto. ¡El Inmortal me ha otorgado una señal!{/n}

languages.text: {n}昂揚感が意識の糸を駆ける。これは…ドミン・{rt_name}？本当にまた{rt_mf|彼|彼女}を感じることができるのだろうか、それとも私の想像だろうか？集中しなければ。血だまりと、それが生み出す模様を見つめる。見える…見えるわ…これは迷宮だ。不死の者がサインを送ってくださった！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}昂揚感が意識の糸を駆ける。これは…エニム・{name}？本当にまた{mf|彼|彼女}を感じることができるのだろうか、それとも私の想像だろうか？集中しなければ。血だまりと、それが生み出す模様を見つめる。見える…見えるわ…これは迷宮だ。不死の者がサインを送ってくださった！{/n}

languages.text: {n}我的意识中突然掠过了一阵震颤。这莫非是……秘者{rt_name}？我是真的再次感受到了{rt_mf|他|她}的存在吗，还是说，这只是我的幻觉？我必须集中精神。我凝视着血泊，看着鲜血构成的图案。我看到……我看到了……一座迷宫，这是不死之神赐予我的预兆！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我的意识中突然掠过了一阵震颤。这莫非是……秘者{rt_name}？我是真的再次感受到了{rt_mf|他|她}的存在吗，还是说，这只是我的幻觉？我必须集中精神。我凝视着血泊，看着鲜血构成的图案。我看到……我看到了……一座迷宫，这是不死之神赐予我的预兆！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un frisson parcourt les fils de ma conscience. S'agit-il... {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin'{rt_name} ? Puis-je vraiment {rt_mf|le|la} sentir de nouveau, ou est-ce le fruit de mon imagination ? Je dois me concentrer. J'observe les flaques de sang et les motifs qu'elles forment. Je vois... Je vois... un labyrinthe. L'Immortel m'a envoyé un signe !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un frisson parcourt les fils de ma conscience. S'agit-il... {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin'{rt_name} ? Puis-je vraiment {rt_mf|le|la} sentir de nouveau, ou est-ce le fruit de mon imagination ? Je dois me concentrer. J'observe les flaques de sang et les motifs qu'elles forment. Je vois... Je vois... un labyrinthe. L'Immortel m'a envoyé un signe !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bilincimin tüm parçalarından bir heyecan akımı geçip gidiyor. Domin'{rt_name}... Bu sen misin? Onu hakikaten bir kez daha hissetmem mümkün mü yoksa hayal mi görüyorum? Konsantre olmalıyım. Gözlerimi kan birikintilerine ve oluşturdukları motiflere dikiyorum. Karşımda bir... Labirent görüyorum. Ölmeyen'in gönderdiği bir işaret bu!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thrill runs through the strands of my consciousness. Is this... Domin'{rt_name}? Can I truly feel {rt_mf|him|her} again, or am I imagining it? I need to concentrate. I gaze at the puddles of blood and the patterns they form. I see... I see... a labyrinth. The Undying One has given me a sign!{/n}
